title: bArO nInenna
sahitya:
bArO nInenna mana mandirakke taDamADuvadEkE 
mAra janaka hari ninnaggaLike smarisuva kSaNa kSaNage


anupallavi

  bAr bArO madhurApuri biTTu sEri koLLadirO vara karipurava


caraNam 1    kuntI makkaLa maneg-hOdenende avaraidi mandi santOSa paDisuvarendu tiLide enjala paLide
kandupita kELo munde nI mudadi pANDiya hoDede indu pariya nAnendu pELalO kAnta enna manadantaryAmi
    caraNam 2    gOkuladallire nandagOpa ninna kaiyinda AkaLa kAyisuvanu ava pApa adu alladale 
nI kELO gOpiyara apalApa lLisu nI bhuPa I karekareyoLu nI kUDiruvudu yAkelo kAntane mama hrtkamalake
    caraNam 3    duSTa mAnava maneg-hOgalu bEDa paTTedAnagaLinda gaTyAgi mEltuLi suvanava mUDha mallara kaiyinda
kaTTI keDahisuvanvanu pracaNDa tiLuhidenuddaNDa iSTu pariya bahu kaSTavEkelO diTTa purandara viTTala krSNa
